arc.control.plane.project.details.descri: Select the subscription to manage deployed resources and costs. Use resource groups like folders to organize and manage all your resources.
arc.control.plane.data.controller.detail: Provide an Azure region and a name for your Azure Arc data controller. This name will be used to identify your Arc location for remote management and monitoring.

arc.control.plane.summary.terms.descript: By clicking 'Script to notebook', I (a) agree to the legal terms and privacy statement(s) associated with the Marketplace offering(s) listed above; (b) authorize Microsoft to bill my current payment method for the fees associated with the offering(s), with the same billing frequency as my Azure subscription; and (c) agree that Microsoft may share my contact, usage and transactional information with the provider(s) of the offering(s) for support, billing and other transactional activities. Microsoft does not provide rights for third-party offerings. For additional details see {0}.

arc.postgres.server.group.name.validatio: Server group name must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters or '-', start with a letter, end with an alphanumeric character, and be 10 characters or fewer in length.
arc.postgres.server.group.extensions.des: A comma-separated list of the Postgres extensions that should be loaded on startup. Please refer to the postgres documentation for supported values.
